content: w-o-l that spells owl owl bless my soul so it does said eeyore welcome wol knitting-wise he s knitted and shaped with short row and pick up stitches - as are all of my patterns i ve listed the yarn i knitted him in within the pattern but you can adapt yarn choices to suit yourself - there is also a kit available here 1 and if you d like to knit his sweet-piglety companion then that pattern is here 2 - also don t forget pooh - he s here 3 and roo - who s free here 4 and of course eeyore who s here 5 > there s also a kit for him too 6 and last but not least for now - tigger 7 i hope you love your wol as much as i love mine and follow along with my instagram @doptpebbles_knits 8 for the last up and coming other character to complete this series 1 https //knittedhome com/product/winnie-the-pooh-and-piglet-knitting-kit/ 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/piglet-doll-2 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pooh-bear-4 4 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/roo-from-winnie-the-pooh 5 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/eeyore-20 6 https //knittedhome com/product/winnie-the-pooh-and-piglet-knitting-kit/ 7 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/tigger-18 8 https //www instagram com/dotpebbles_knits/
